name: Crystal.RPGTiles
description: Adds fast tiles and tilemap rendering

classes.name: Tilemap
classes.construction: const output = new Tilemap(await toObject("Material", data.material)); for (let i = 0; i < data.tiles?.length ?? 0; i++) { for (let j = 0; j < data.tiles[i].sprites.length; j++) { const sprite = data.tiles[i].sprites[j]; for (let k = 0; k < sprite.coords.length; k++) output.AddTile(await toObject("Tile", { palette: data.tiles[i].palette, spriteID: sprite.id, position: sprite.coords[k] })); } } return output;
